text_blocks: I see that my department is "External", which means I'm an external user (contractor, partner, etc.). According to the rules, external users cannot access employee data, projects, or workload information.

input.message: I'm sorry, but as an external user, I don't have access to employee data, project assignments, or workload information. This type of internal workforce data is restricted to company employees only. Please contact HR or a company employee if you need this information.
